title: (x) sans used in Nokia KPN ad - KPN Display (custom font by Pieter van Rosmalen) {Pieter}
content:
This is a collage from a Nokia ad in a Dutch newspaper:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090420135334im_/http:/typophile.com/files/NokiaKPN_3625.gif)

ID please? With elaborations if available. Thanks in advance.

hhp
author: hrant

comments.content:
Hello Hrant,

I made it for KPN (commissioned by Studio Dumbar).  
You can find more about it here: [http://www.caketype.com/custom.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20090420135334/http:/www.caketype.com/custom.html "http://www.caketype.com/custom.html")  
The website only mentions two weights, but it has three, light, normal and bold.

Pieter

Wow - not only do I get a quick ID, but I get it from the designer himself! :-)  
Itâ€™s nice, btw.

hhp
